name: ww2.click - Fun shooting 2D game
description:
Hi  :))

We would like to introduce to you ww2.click - an online 2D game inspired from the world war 2 themes. In ww2.click, you can freely choose your playing style, strategy, etc. It is fun, and completely free! You can play online with browser at https://ww2.click/. Because this game is just published, the number of players is quite limited. It will be funnier if you play 1v1 or team with your friends :))

Hope you have the best time with this game.

If you have any comments, please feel free and lets us know.

Best,

HK Studio

#2d #fun #free #action #online  #io  #shooting
